item.title: Collaborative Filtering and Recommender Systems
item.description: Recommendation systems recommend items such as products or services to users. This is usually done on the basis of evaluations (collaborative filter) or of item properties (content-based filter). The basic idea of a recommendation system is to recommend products such as books, services or places of interest or other so-called items to an active user. Based on information about the user, the items and, if necessary, other data, it is determined to what extent an item corresponds to the user’s taste.
